definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lit. to pour cold water on/fig. to dampen one's enthusiasm
shouting abuse in the street like a fishwife
broad, belt-shaped noodles, popular in Shaanxi, also known as 𰻞𰻞麵|𰻝𰻝面[biang2 biang2 mian4]
spilt water/(fig.) sth that can not be retrieved/spilt milk
water once spilt cannot be retrieved (idiom); irreversible change

sentences.english: Bridget poured cold water on the idea of crossing the mountains in winter, pointing out all the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 了所有的困难，对冬天越过丛山的主意泼了一瓢冷水。

sentences.english: He splashed the soup on the table.
The problem is you to this professional forums spread what on?
sentences.chinese: 问题是你来这种专业论坛上撒什么泼？

sentences.english: It was like a cup of cold water hurled over my head.
sentences.chinese: 这像是兜头给我泼了一瓢冷水。

sentences.english: Mood is a bottle of water which is splashing uselessly.
sentences.chinese: 心情是一盆将泼还止的水。

sentences.english: The oaf stumbled over the bucket, spilling all the water.
sentences.chinese: 那个笨手笨脚的人绊到了木桶，把水全给泼了。

sentences.english: Robins were sprinkling the evening air with flute-like whistles.
sentences.chinese: 知更鸟用长笛般的鸣声泼溅着晚间的空气。

sentences.english: Poured fire Yuqing táng porridge cold, warm wind falling light shoots Yu.
sentences.chinese: 泼火雨晴饧粥冷，落花风暖笋舆轻。

sentences.english: In his opinion, continuing to pay rent each month for his apartment is just pouring money down the drain.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，继续给付房屋租金就是将钱向水一样往外泼。

sentences.english: Pour the sauce over the tomatoes and beans. Toss the salad well and serve.
sentences.chinese: 把酱泼在西红柿和菜豆上，拌一拌就可以享用了。

sentences.english: He wet down the ground by buckets of water.
sentences.chinese: 他用一桶桶水把地泼湿。

sentences.english: Such increases are pouring cold water on many once-hot markets.
sentences.chinese: 这些加息给一度火热的市场泼了一盆冷水。

sentences.english: Pendry's project is one of several around the world experimenting with invisibility .
sentences.chinese: 泼恩德利的项目是全球几个隐形实验项目之一。

sentences.english: The clumsy waiter spilt the soup.
sentences.chinese: 那笨拙的侍者把汤泼了。

sentences.english: Well, you bring the world the purity of music, the world has thrown you a water.
sentences.chinese: 你带给世界那么纯净的音乐，世界却泼你一身脏水。

definition: to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
to pour cold water/fig. to discourage
to overturn/to overthrow/to strike down (an enemy)
coming right into one's face/imminent/to put first
to smash/to pound/to fail/to muck up/to bungle
lit. splitting the head and covering the face (idiom); fig. pelting (with rain etc)/showering down
